title: Evolution of Apple's iPhone
text:
Evolution of the iPhone (Photo: USA TODAY)
31 CONNECT 85 TWEET 3 LINKEDIN 8 COMMENT EMAIL MORE Apple will unveil the new iPhone on Wednesday. The next iPhone is expected to have Force Touch, or pressure-sensitive technology that's already on the Apple Watch. The ability to shoot higher-resolution 4K video, and an improved processor.
A closer look at the innovative features of Apple's iPhones:
It's the smartphone that started it all, with former Apple CEO Steve Jobs calling it "magical" and " revolutionary."
WHAT'S THE HYPE: It's the smartphone that started it all, with former Apple CEO Steve Jobs calling it "magical" and " revolutionary."
WHAT'S NEW: 3.5-inch multi-touch screen: sensors that change orientation of phone; Cover Flow.
CAMERA RESOLUTION: 2 megapixel
ORIGINAL PRICE: $499 — $599
NUMBER OF 3RD-PARTY APPS AT LAUNCH: 0
Imgur
Boasting a faster wireless network and lower price, this iteration introduced users to the world of apps.
WHAT'S THE HYPE: Boasting a faster wireless network and lower price, this iteration introduced users to the world of apps.
WHAT'S NEW: App store; photo geotagging; parental controls; visual voice mail.
CAMERA RESOLUTION: 2 megapixel
ORIGINAL PRICE: $199 – $299
NUMBER OF 3RD-PARTY APPS AT LAUNCH: 500
The third-generation iPhone was faster and used less battery, but the greatest feature of all was the ability to cut, copy and paste text.
WHAT'S THE HYPE: The third-generation iPhone was faster and used less battery, but the greatest feature of all was the ability to
cut, copy and paste text.
WHAT'S NEW: Voice dialing; landscape keyboard; cut/copy/paste; search function
CAMERA RESOLUTION: 3 megapixel
ORIGINAL PRICE: $199 — $299
NUMBER OF 3RD-PARTY APPS AT LAUNCH: 50,000
Buzz swirled around the new stainless-steel and glass design, and the debut of the video chat service FaceTime.
WHAT'S THE HYPE: Buzz swirled around the new stainless-steel and glass design, and the debut of the video chat service FaceTime.
WHAT'S NEW: FaceTime video chat; 5-megapixel camera; iBooks; HD video recording
CAMERA RESOLUTION: 5 megapixel
ORIGINAL PRICE: $199 — $299
NUMBER OF 3RD-PARTY APPS AT LAUNCH: 225,000
iOS 5, Apple's new mobile operating system. Top features include iCloud to wirelessly push content across devices; multimedia iMessage service.
WHAT'S THE HYPE: iOS 5, Apple's new mobile operating system. Top features include iCloud to wirelessly push content across devices; multimedia iMessage service.
WHAT'S NEW: A5 dual-core processor; iMessage; Twitter integration; location-based reminders
CAMERA RESOLUTION: 8 megapixel
ORIGINAL PRICE: $199 — $399
NUMBER OF 3RD-PARTY APPS AT LAUNCH: 360,000
iOS 6, Apple's latest mobile operating system. Top features include improved Maps app with spoken turn-by-turn and 3-D navigation, and Passbook, a new way to store and scan boarding passes, movie tickets, coupons and more.
WHAT'S THE HYPE: iOS 6, Apple's latest mobile operating system. Top features include improved Maps app with spoken turn-by-turn and 3-D navigation, and Passbook, a new way to store and scan boarding passes, movie tickets, coupons and more.
WHAT'S NEW: New 4-inch diagonal display. Past iPhones have been 3.5 inches. The added space allows for a fifth row of icons on the home screen.
CAMERA RESOLUTION: 8 megapixel
ORIGINAL PRICE: $199 — $399
NUMBER OF 3RD-PARTY APPS AT LAUNCH: 700,000
WHAT'S THE HYPE: The A7 chip gives the user CPU and graphics performance up to 2x's faster than the A6 chip. iPhone 5S looks and feels thin and light. Also, available in gold, silver and space gray.
WHAT'S NEW: iPhone 5S has a fingerprint identity sensor capable of 360-degree readability. The iPhone 5S features the iOS 7 operating system.
CAMERA RESOLUTION: 8 megapixel
ORIGINAL PRICE: $199 — $399
WHAT'S THE HYPE: The A8 processing chip offers performance 50 times faster than the original iPhone and a 25% bump compared to last year's iPhone 5S.
WHAT'S NEW: 4.7-inch display, improved iSight camera, Apple Pay mobile payment system, near-field communication (NFC) technology.
CAMERA RESOLUTION: 8 megapixel
ORIGINAL PRICE: $199 — $399
WHAT'S THE HYPE: The A8 chip processing chip offers performance 50 times faster than the original iPhone and a 25% bump compared to last year's iPhone 5S.
WHAT'S NEW: 5.5-inch display, improved iSight camera, Apple Pay mobile payment system, near-field communication (NFC) technology.
CAMERA RESOLUTION: 8 megapixel
ORIGINAL PRICE: $299 — $499
